name: The Visitor (itch) (Secretmapper)
description:
A life form visits a space station.

---

The Visitor is a short and sweet metroidvania experience. Survive the space station, evolve and save your bretheren.

There is a sequence break in the game that's supposed to give an 'alternate ending'. Can you find it?

Team

  • Secretmapper - Programming
  • Apokalepestki - Art
  • LeoWASD - Music
